anathema: Destroy an artistic creation without providing something in its place, refuse to act if called upon
edict: Protect the monuments of your people, stir others into action, strive to perfect an art or craft
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Alglenweis (Princess of the Rime)](/Deities.aspx?ID=605)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

Called the Princess of the Rime by some, Alglenweis is the most popular Sarkorian deity in the Realm of the Mammoth Lords; though, since the opening of the Worldwound, her worship in Sarkoris has dwindled. Her ties to [demonic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) entities like her father have placed her in a position of mistrust among Sarkorians who fear the return of a malevolent entity like Deskari.

Originally a localized deity popularized by the witches of the Stagheart clan, Alglenweis encourages her devotees to create and protect works of art, especially those with cultural significance. Her followers cherish winter as a time to work on projects and spend hours with friends and relatives out of the cold.

Today, Sarkorians who still follow the Princess of Rime celebrate their return to their homelands by reclaiming the crafting traditions of their people. They also encourage incursions into portions of the Sarkoris Scar still infested with demonic forces and outfit expeditions to ruins of old settlements in hopes of recovering artistic treasures, even after many years under demonic occupation. Those who venerate Alglenweis hope that, by serving as an active force in the ongoing reclamation efforts, they can also help return Alglenweis to the prominence she once enjoyed. The most common depictions of the goddess feature her as a gigantic snowy owl whose claws clutch a skein of yarn and whose feathers are made of ice.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Sarkorian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=15)

**Edicts** Protect the monuments of your people, stir others into action, strive to perfect an art or craft

**Anathema** Destroy an artistic creation without providing something in its place, refuse to act if called upon

**Area of Concern**
Crafting, resolve, winter

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [War Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=402)

**Domains** [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=103), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Agitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=2341)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1477)

- **5th**
[Howling Blizzard](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559)

</column>
name: Alglenweis (Princess of the Rime)
religious_symbol: Owl talon clutching a frozen skein of yarn
